00031 
00032 
00033 #define SGDMA_ID_VALID    0x12040000
00034 
00035 //----------------------------------------
00036 //             DMA IP Defines
00037 //----------------------------------------
00038 #define BUS_A   0
00039 #define BUS_B   1
00040 #define PB      2
00041 
00042 // SGDMA IP Registers
00043 #define IPID_REG       0x00
00044 #define IPVER_REG      0x04
00045 #define GCONTROL_REG   0x08
00046 #define GSTATUS_REG    0x0c
00047 #define GEVENT_REG     0x10
00048 #define GERROR_REG     0x14
00049 #define GARBITER_REG   0x18
00050 #define GAUX_REG       0x1c
00051 #define CHAN_CTRL_BASE 0x200
00052 #define BD_BASE        0x400
00053 
00054 
00055 // Use with SRC_BUS() and DST_BUS() macros  to define BUS size
00056 #define DATA_64BIT   3
00057 #define DATA_32BIT   2
00058 #define DATA_16BIT   1
00059 #define DATA_8BIT    0
00060 
00061 #define EOL       1
00062 #define NEXT      0
00063 #define SPLIT     2
00064 #define LOCK      4
00065 #define AUTORTY   8
00066 
00067 #define ADDR_MODE_FIFO 0
00068 #define ADDR_MODE_MEM  1
00069 #define ADDR_MODE_LOOP 2
00070 
00071 #define SRC_SIZE(a) (a<<10) // 0=8 bit, 1=16 bit, 2=32 bit, 3=64 bit
00072 #define SRC_ADDR_MODE(a) (a<<13)  // 0=FIFO, 1=MEM, 2=LOOP
00073 #define SRC_BUS(a) (a<<8)
00074 #define SRC_MEM (1<<13)
00075 #define SRC_FIFO (0<<13)
00076 
00077 #define DST_SIZE(a) (a<<18) // 0=8 bit, 1=16 bit, 2=32 bit, 3=64 bit
00078 #define DST_ADDR_MODE(a) (a<<21)  // 0=FIFO, 1=MEM, 2=LOOP
00079 #define DST_BUS(a) (a<<16)
00080 #define DST_MEM (1<<21)
00081 #define DST_FIFO (0<<21)
00082 
00083 #define CHAN_CTRL(n)   (0x200 + n * 32)   // Channel n Control Register
00084 #define CHAN_STAT(n)   (0x204 + n * 32)   // Channel n status Register
00085 #define CHAN_CURSRC(n) (0x208 + n * 32)   // Channel n Current Source being read
00086 #define CHAN_CURDST(n) (0x20c + n * 32)   // Channel n Current Destination being written
00087 #define CHAN_CURXFR(n) (0x210 + n * 32)   // Channel n Current Xfer Count still remaining
00088 #define CHAN_PBOFF(n)  (0x214 + n * 32)   // Channel n Packet Buffer Offset
00089 
00090 #define BD_CFG0(n) (0x400 + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Config0 Register
00091 #define BD_CFG1(n) (0x404 + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Config1 Register
00092 #define BD_SRC(n)  (0x408 + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Source Address Register
00093 #define BD_DST(n)  (0x40c + n * 16)   // Buffer Descriptor Destination Address Register
00094 
00095 #define CHAN_STATUS_ENABLED  1
00096 #define CHAN_STATUS_REQUEST  2
00097 #define CHAN_STATUS_XFERCOMP 4
00098 #define CHAN_STATUS_EOD      8
00099 #define CHAN_STATUS_CLRCOMP  0x10
00100 #define CHAN_STATUS_ERRORS   0x00ff0000
00101 
00102 #define XFER_SIZE(a) (a)
00103 #define BURST_SIZE(a) (a<<16)
00104 
00105 #define PKT_BUF(x) (x) 
00106 #define PKT_BUF_SIZE 4096   // this is the default SGDMAC Pkt Buf size (and what is instantiated)
00107
